items.Justification: While this paper discusses high Q micro-resonators, it's primarily focused on single-atom Cavity-QED, which is not directly relevant to FSOC or adaptive optics.
This paper on non-linear low symmetry photonic crystal structures is not directly related to FSOC, adaptive optics, or atmospheric turbulence.
This paper on spin-of-light gyroscope is not directly related to FSOC or adaptive optics, but it does involve wavefront manipulation which might be tangentially relevant.
This paper on molecular dynamics is not related to FSOC or adaptive optics and doesn't involve any optical components.
This paper on excitons is related to quantum optics, but it doesn't directly relate to FSOC or adaptive optics and wavefront sensing.
